name: TVMonogramContentView
desc: A view that contains a circular image of a person or the person’s initials.

items.name: init(configuration: TVMonogramContentConfiguration)
items.desc: Creates a monogram content view with the configuration you specify.

items.name: struct TVMonogramContentConfiguration
items.desc: A content configuration for a monogram view.

items.name: var configuration: UIContentConfiguration
items.desc: The current configuration of the view.

items.name: var focusedFrameGuide: UILayoutGuide
items.desc: A guide for positioning other elements with the content view image’s focused frame.
